overview: Persia Monir and Danica Dillon share a “special moment” that rivals the most erotic of stories. Zoey Holloway and Jessi Palmer get so raunchy, that the silence itself is sexually arousing. The passion and lust these two have for each other are off the meter! Raquel Sieb and Dani Jensen are more than eager to get each other’s clothes off, and Darla Crane and Cassandra Nix’s intimacy goes beyond the realm of “Curiosity”!
title: Mother-Daughter Exchange Club  23
